channel.title: Looking for a hoster
channel.description: Hey, i own a 317 server but am no longer able to host. If somebody is willing to host for me you will receive co owner of the server. Pm me or add me on msn* Being able to at least code basic stuff is perferred.

item.title: Looking for a hoster

item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Wrong section.
In order to recruit developers and /or hosters please post here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.html
[/quote]
Wrong, You cannon’t request a hoster/coder on this site.[/quote]
I said recruit not request… And yes, as long as he follows the rules of that section it is the appropriate placefor something like this.

Read full topic
